Question
========
What is the key advantage of detailed prompts when asking an AI to write code?

Answerlist
----------
* They reduce the need for any iteration
* They make it more likely the output matches your intent
* They eliminate the need to run code
* They prevent the AI from using packages

Solution
========
Specific prompts guide the AI toward the desired output.

Answerlist
----------
* False
* True
* False
* False
